biocontainers.name: umis
biocontainers.summary: Tools for processing UMI RNA-tag data

biotools.summary: A package that provides tools for estimating expression in RNA-Seq data which performs sequencing of end tags of transcript, and incorporate molecular tags to correct for amplification bias.

bioschemas.name: umis
bioschemas.summary: A package that provides tools for estimating expression in RNA-Seq data which performs sequencing of end tags of transcript, and incorporate molecular tags to correct for amplification bias.
